com.palantir.curatortestrule

Class SharedZooKeeperRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.rules.ExternalResource
      • com.palantir.curatortestrule.ZooKeeperRule
        • com.palantir.curatortestrule.SharedZooKeeperRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.junit.rules.TestRule

    public final class SharedZooKeeperRule
extends ZooKeeperRule
    A ZooKeeperRule that shares servers based on the port number specified in the constructor.

    If the server on the specified port has not been created by a SharedZooKeeperRule, then a new server will be started. If another SharedZooKeeperRule is using that same port at the same time (during concurrent execution), then that same server will be connected to. A ZooKeeperRuleConfig started by this class will be closed after execution of the JUnit Statement only if it is the last SharedZooKeeperRule that references it.

    If port 0 is specified, then the port provided by the OS will be used. Unlike LocalZooKeeperRule, the same server will be shared among all tests specifying port 0.

    WARNING: Since ZooKeeperRuleConfig instances are shared, behavior is undefined if two different SharedZooKeeperRules share a server on the same port while expecting different ZooKeeperRuleConfig implementations.
